|brand = Buffalo |model = WSR-600D |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = HP |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = March 18, 2015 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Buffalo_WSR-600DHP |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = FDI000000029 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7621S; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 1004Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 880 <!-- 880 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = Serial(SPI) |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM68B16CWQH-25H; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = CC:E1:D5 |oui = CC:E1:D5
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = Buffalo-A-XXXX, Buffalo-G-XXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^Buffalo-A-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}$,,, ^Buffalo-G-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}$, |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Gemtek |manuf_model = WRTR-308N |manuf_rev = v0.1 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt, Padavan (unofficially)
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/31/2015 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16833162151 |asin = B00OL61RBU |asin_country = JP |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7603E;MT7603EN; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Ralink;RT5592EP;RT5592EPL; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "WRTR-308N_V01", "19K-P13-0000R" and "RoHS" :is silkscreened on the board in the images. *OEM: [[Gemtek]] WRTR-308N (v0.1)
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:62022-116#4133 On '''iXBT''' forums] (''Padavan'') :[http://fotkidepo.ru/?id=album:55526 Gallery on '''iXBT''']

==See also== ===Devices=== ====[[List of Buffalo Devices - Wireless Routers]]==== *[[Buffalo AirStation WSR-600DHP]] :'''Buffalo WSR-600DHP''' (''2.4GHz/11n, 5GHz/11n'') :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621S @880MHz Single-core (0103) :Flash: 16MB (SPI), RAM: ''[[EtronTech]]'' 64MB (DDR2) :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7603E, [[Ralink]] RT5592EP *[[Buffalo WHR-600D]] *[[Buffalo WZR-600DHP]] *[[Buffalo WZR-600DHP2]] *[[Buffalo WZR-900DHP]] *[[Buffalo AirStation WSR-1166DHP]] :'''[[Buffalo WSR-1166DD]]''' FCC ID: FDI000000028 :'''[[Buffalo WSR-1166DHP]]''' (''2.4GHz/11n, 5GHz/11ac'') :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621A @880MHz Dual-core (0103) :Flash: 16MB (SPI), RAM: 128MB (DDR3) :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7603E, [[MediaTek]] MT7612E
